General.Name: Puradelta Lestari PT
General.Description: PT Puradelta Lestari Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development business in Indonesia. It operates through Property, Hotel, and Others segments. The company sells commercial lots and commercial products, including shopping centers and shop houses; residential products, such as landed houses; operates and rents factory facilities; operates a hotel under the Le Premier Hotel name; operates water treatment plants, as well as provides estate management services. It also develops and manages Kota Deltamas, an integrated area of approximately 3,200 hectares consisting of industrial, residential, and commercial estates. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia. PT Puradelta Lestari Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sumber Arusmulia.
General.Address: Jl. Kali Besar Barat No. 8, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia
